Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Collidable, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.KeyListener, Collidable
    Player class that represents the users character
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    srikrishna + kinjal(collidable methods)
